name: Splash Drift 3D
description:
Easy tap and hold action for the endless drifting experience.

Learn to perform perfect turns and test how far you can go.

Addictive gameplay with 20+ boat options!

Features
- Free to play, play it anytime anywhere.
- Easy controls.
- Fast, addictive and fun gameplay.
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
